changeSet.author: Joosep Koort
changeSet.sql: CREATE SEQUENCE seq START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1;

changeSet.author: Joosep Koort
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE PUBLIC.PROBABILITIES_KEYWORDS ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS SEQUENCE seq PRIMARY KEY, value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, level BIGINT NOT NULL, level_as_word VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, );

changeSet.author: Joosep Koort
